message: Hi Bob, I'm interested in selling you this product. I think it would be a great fit for you, and I'm confident it's worth a lot to you. I'm asking for $12,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my interest in the product. I appreciate the value you see in it, but I believe I can't pay more than $9,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is really my starting point considering its true value. How about we meet in the middle at $10,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position, but I still believe I can only pay up to $9,500 for the product. I hope we can find a fair compromise.
